Build 20020226

I have zipped the workspace that causes the problem. Please let me know if it 
is needed.

I'm getting the same exceptions updating my workspace from the synchronize view 
which prevents me from catching up with my team.

Jerome, I've got the same problem in the sync view. As a workaround, just try 
again (works for me on the second time).

Unfortunately, this didn't do it for me. I had to hack 
the .metadata\.plugins\org.eclipse.debug.ui\launchHistory.xml to remove all 
entries.
Can we get a patch for this?

Patch is now available on "projects -> platform -> debug -> developement 
resources" page.
*** Bug 10311 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 10404 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 10463 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 10502 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

I'm using build 20020227 which apparently still has the problem. Can I use the 
patch with that build as well? The project homepage says the patch is 
compatbile with 0226.
Will the fix be in build 20020228?
The fix is in 20020228. The patch should also work with 20020227.
